metric.name: RPC Requests
metric.description: Indicates the overall RPC requests that are currently executing within the information store process.

metric.name: RPC Averaged Latency
metric.description: Indicates the RPC latency, in milliseconds, averaged for all operations in the last 1,024 packets.

metric.name: RPC Operations/sec
metric.description: Indicates the current number of RPC operations that are occurring per second.

metric.name: RPC Num. of Slow Packets
metric.description: Shows the number of RPC packets in the past 1,024 packets that have latencies longer than 2 seconds.

metric.name: RPC Average Latency
metric.description: Shows a server RPC latency, in milliseconds, averaged for the past 1,024 packets for a particular client protocol.

metric.name: JET Pages Read/sec
metric.description: Shows the rate that database pages are read from disk while processing requests for the client.

metric.name: Directory Access: LDAP Reads/sec
metric.description: Shows the current rate that the Lightweight Directory Access Protocol (LDAP) reads occur while processing requests for the client.

metric.name: Directory Access: LDAP Searches/sec
metric.description: Shows the current rate that the LDAP searches occur while processing requests for the client.

metric.name: JET Log Records/sec
metric.description: Shows the rate that database log records are generated while processing requests for the client.

metric.name: Messages Queued for Submission
metric.description: Shows the current number of submitted messages that are not yet processed by the transport layer.

metric.name: Average Calendar Attendant Processing time
metric.description: Shows the average time to process an event in the Calendar Attendant.

metric.name: Calendar Requests Failed
metric.description: Shows the total number of failures that occurred while the Calendar Attendant was processing events.

metric.name: RPC Latency average (msec)
metric.description: Shows the average latency, in milliseconds, of RPC requests. The average is calculated over all RPCs since exrpc32 was loaded.

metric.name: ROP Requests outstanding
metric.description: Shows the total number of outstanding remote operations (ROP) requests.

metric.name: RPC Requests outstanding
metric.description: Shows the total number of outstanding RPC requests.

metric.name: RPC Requests failed (%)
metric.description: Shows the percentage of failed requests in the total number of RPC requests. Here, failed means the sum of failed with error code plus failed with exception.

metric.name: RPC Requests Sent/sec
metric.description: Shows the current rate of initiated RPC requests per second.

metric.name: RPC Slow Requests (%)
metric.description: Shows the percentage of slow RPC requests among all RPC requests.

metric.name: RPC Slow Requests latency average (msec)
metric.description: Shows the average latency, in milliseconds, of slow requests.

metric.name: Hub Servers In Retry
metric.description: Shows the number of Hub Transport servers in retry mode.

metric.name: Successful Submissions Per Second
metric.description: Determines current mail submission rate.

metric.name: Temporary Submission Failures/sec
metric.description: Shows the number of temporary submission failures per second.

metric.name: Average Resource Booking Processing Time
metric.description: Shows the average time to process an event in the Resource Booking Attendant.

metric.name: Slow Findrow Rate
metric.description: Shows the rate at which the slower FindRow needs to be used in the mailbox store.

metric.name: Search Task Rate
metric.description: Shows the number of search tasks created per second.

metric.name: Slow QP Threads
metric.description: Shows the number of query processor threads currently running queries that are not optimized.

metric.name: Slow Search Threads
metric.description: Shows the number of search threads currently running queries that are not optimized.

metric.name: Categorization Count
metric.description: Shows the categorization count in the number of categorizations that exist in the mailbox store. Categorizations are created when a user creates a filtered view or performs a search. When the information store must maintain an excessive number of categorizations, performance can be affected.

metric.name: Full Crawl Mode Status
metric.description:
Indicates whether this .mdb file is going through a full crawl (value=1) or not (value=0).
Used to determine if a full crawl is occurring for any specified database.

metric.name: Average Document Indexing Time
metric.description: Shows the average, in milliseconds, of how long it takes to index documents.

metric.name: Throttling Delay Value
metric.description: Shows the total time, in milliseconds, a worker thread sleeps before it retrieves a document from the Microsoft Exchange Information Store service. This is set by the throttling monitor thread.

metric.name: Recent Average Latency of RPCs Used to Obtain Content
metric.description: Shows the average latency, in milliseconds, of the most recent RPCs to the Microsoft Exchange Information Store service. These RPCs are used to get content for the filter daemon for the specified database.

property.value: Recent Average Latency of RPCs Used to Obtain Content

metric.name: Mailboxes Processed/sec
metric.description: Shows the rate of mailboxes processed by time-based assistants per second.

metric.name: Events Polled/sec
metric.description: Shows the number of events polled per second.

metric.name: Events in queue
metric.description: Shows the number of events in the in-memory queue waiting to be processed by the assistants.

metric.name: Average Event Processing Time in Seconds
metric.description: Shows the average processing time of the events chosen. The returned values should be less than two at all times.

property.value: Average Event Processing Time in Seconds

metric.name: Requests Failed
metric.description: Shows the total number of failures that occurred while the Resource Booking Attendant was processing events. Returned values should be 0 at all times.

metric.name: Failed Submissions Per Second
metric.description: Shows the number of failed submissions per second. Returned values should be 0 at all times.

metric.name: Temporary Submission Failures/sec
metric.description: Shows the number of temporary submission failures per second. Returned values should be 0 at all times.

metric.name: CopyQueueLength
metric.description: Shows the number of transaction log files waiting to be copied to the passive copy log file folder. A copy is not considered complete until it has been checked for corruption. Returned values should be less than 1 at all times for continuous replication.

metric.name: ReplayQueueLength
metric.description: Shows the number of transaction log files waiting to be replayed into the passive copy. This indicates the current replay queue length. Higher values cause longer store mount times when a handoff, failover, or activation is performed.

description.value: When monitoring servers running Microsoft Exchange Server with the Mailbox server role installed.
